name: Light Down
description:
Night Owl series, Light Down is a first-person roguelike horror PC game with multiple endings. Description

Did you feel something behind you after turning off the lights? Do you always feel like someone is staring at you from behind. Maybe they hide themselves so you can't see. Feel like if you take a slow step, you'll fall into their clutches.

Every night, Thomas had to turn off the lights and go back to his bedroom, no matter what happened. This game has multiple endings for players to solve one by one. Beware of everything that follows you at night.

Controls
  • WASD to move.
  • Left Mouse Button to interact.
  • Esc to pause.
Endings
  1. Even sleeping on the street is better than staying here.
  2. Fight against your fear, and overcome them.
  3. Never buy a cheap house again.
  4. Underestimated destructive power.
  5. Cherish life, sleep early.
